scenario_text.value:
I’m nothing but a burden... All of this,
everything, it’s all my fault...

Don’t be ridiculous! How could all of this
possibly be Miu’s fault?

Well, I really did used to think that, you
know.

Oh, but not anymore! Thanks to you and all
the others, I’ve changed!

Sitting around crying about things won’t
help! I can’t just let the others protect me.

I need to stand on my own two feet, and take
care of things myself.

I’m doing just fine now, thanks to Shakomon,
my friends...and my brother.
